name: Forged Page
description:
A small, but unhurried episodic story about a princess whose life turns out to be nothing more than a tool to achieve goals of one overly ambitious person, for whom only the result matters.

A story aimed at those people who like the slow movement of the plot with a lot of implicit details of the story in the dialogues and some other aspects of the game.

The game was translated into English using an online translator, so I, as a non-native English speaker, could not keep track of all the mistakes in the text. In the future, after the end of the Game Jam, I plan to improve the translation and finalize a number of other aspects of the game.
